# Azure AI Foundry Workshop Context

This repository contains documentation and examples for building AI-native applications using Azure AI Foundry. Key concepts include:

## Agent Development
- Health advisor implementation
- File search capabilities
- Code interpreter integration
- Event-driven patterns

## Azure Services
- AI Foundry project setup
- AI Search integration
- Cosmos DB vector storage
- PostgreSQL with pgvector
- API Management for AI endpoints
- Logic Apps for workflows
- Azure Functions deployment

## Evaluation & Monitoring
- Groundedness evaluation
- Relevance metrics
- OpenTelemetry integration
- Azure Monitor setup

## Implementation Patterns
- RAG with AI Search
- Multi-tool agents
- Event-driven processing
- Real-time monitoring

This context is optimized for AI coding assistants to provide relevant suggestions for Azure AI Foundry development.
